TextBlock.Text: CANARAE: I have unfortunate news my friends, the experiment has failed.
CANARAE: My measurements indicate that stability is decreasing but my instruments lack accuracy. We need some means of more accurately measuring the time remaining.
CEDRUS: I can begin construction of such a measuring device immediately. Perhaps a clock tower would be aesthetically pleasing.

MIACEAE: While I appreciate your eye for aesthetics Cedrus, remember that speed of construction is key. Helian and the rest of the clan are eager to move on, particularly if there is a risk of destabilization.
